name: huge mana crystal
description: This is a mana crystal that juts from the ground as if it had sprouted up like a weed.  It pulses with a delicate blue energy, occasionally bursting with flashes of pent-up light.

name: Teleport stone statue
description: It is an unusual looking stone statue. Once activated, it is possible to return to the vicinity of the stone statue with an item obtained from defeating a boss.

name: open metal door
description: An extremely resilient door made of assorted steel, carved and pounded into shape.  It's open, so no tools are needed to break in.

name: Mana Mecha Pod LV1
description:
It is a huge pod LV1 containing one mana mecha. It can be opened by pressing the `E` button.
 it is randomly selected from 18 different types, and very rarely, it may contain a strong mecha.

name: Mana Mecha Pod LV2
description:
It is a huge pod LV2 containing one mana mecha. It can be opened by pressing the `E` button.
 it is randomly selected from 13 different types, and may even, it may contain a strong mecha.

name: Mana Mecha Pod LV3
description:
It is a huge pod LV3 that contains one mana mecha. You can open it by pressing the `E` button
 it is randomly selected from 9 different types and always contains a strong mecha.

name: Ice Crystal

name: Large Ice Crystal

name: huge soul stone
description: This is a luminous ore that holds mystical energy. Its vivid colors and profound radiance symbolize the soul. Magic using this stone has the power to manipulate the soul and spirit, and can transform people. However, handling its power requires a high level of skill and knowledge, and its use by the inexperienced is fraught with great danger.

name: huge flame castle
description: This ore has the attribute of flame and is capable of releasing high-temperature heat. It is also said to be a powerful source of magical power for wizards who manipulate flames. Its bright red color gives the impression of a burning flame.

name: huge aquamarine harmony
description: This ore has a beautiful blue color like clear water and is said to have the power to manipulate water. It is also believed to calm the mind through its resonance with water and to provide a sense of peace and tranquility. It is one of the minerals often used by wizards who deal with water magic.

name: huge emerald leaf
description: This ore is shaped like a beautiful green leaf and has strong natural powers. This ore can be used to invoke nature's guardian spirits and cast powerful forest spells.

name: huge lightning quartz
description: A quartz ore that contains lightning-like electrical energy. Often used by magicians who deal with magical energy.

name: huge carne stone
description: Carnestone is an ore-like mass of flesh with a deep red hue and a distinctive striated pattern. Its name means `stone of flesh` in Latin, and it is believed that when enthusiastic warriors eat carnestone before battle, it improves their physical abilities. However, legend has it that eating too much can lead to insanity, and for this reason carneth stones are not widely used.

name: huge emerald manite
description: This is an ore with a mysterious green color that is imbued with magical powers. Its name is said to come from its beautiful emerald-like color and the name of a gnome wizard named Manite. It is believed to have the effect of strengthening magical powers, enhancing mental powers, and drawing out insight and creativity. It is also believed to heal the wounded spirit and mind and enhance physical resilience, making it one of the most beloved of the green ores.

name: huge siren blue
description: This is a blue ore that is believed to be the singing voice of the Sirens, beautiful witches who live under the sea. Because of its mysterious brilliance and beauty, it is often used by wizards interested in the mysteries of the sea. It is also said that magic items made from this ore are imbued with the magic that governs the power of water.

name: huge albion megastone
description: Although this stone has the appearance of a white crystal, its value is actually not very high. However, it is loved by many for its beautiful appearance and is widely known as an ornamental stone. The stone has an air of tranquility and peace, and its very presence brings peace of mind. The stone is also said to enhance spiritual energy and is useful for meditation and purification of the mind.

name: giant mashroom
description: These are giant dungeon mushrooms several meters long. You can tell the type of mushroom by its color and shape.
